title: Markov Chains and Mixing Times
summary: Markov Chains and Mixing Times is a book on Markov chain mixing times. The second edition was written by David A. Levin, and Yuval Peres. Elizabeth Wilmer was a co-author on the first edition and is credited as a contributor to the second edition. The first edition was published in 2009 by the American Mathematical Society,[1][2] with an expanded second edition in 2017.[3][4][5][6]
